# Why use R?


- Your data and your analysis should live separate
 
- In R, data are imported, manipulated, represented, but the data remain the safely in your data folder. 
 - This means you can't screw up...or at least it is harder to screw up

---

# R is great for...


- Data Cleaning

- Plotting

- Summarizing

- Manipulating Data

- Generating Reproducible Analysis

- Sharing Code
